alert.note: Alert for Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 10:14PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Poinsett County through 1100 PM CDT... At 1013 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harrisburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trumann, Marked Tree, Payneway, Tulot, Landers, Weona, Hatchie Coon, Cassidy, Maple Grove, Promised Land, Whitaker, McCormick, Northern Ohio, Old Weona, Judd Hill and Lake Poinsett State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
